content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to explain briefly and vividly who EPAM Quality Engineering employee is? We were bold enough to offer our own vision in the new logo! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Falcon & Quality Engineering have 3 values in common:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" speed, keen sight and high flight. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Flying high, this bird of prey can cover endless distances, and at the same time, even tiny detail won’t escape its keen eye. Similarly, a tester can see the full picture of a product or solution, and, if necessary, notice in the most insignificant moment a brilliant answer to the question. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The falcon is the fastest and one of the smartest birds on the planet. It reflects a tester's ability to make decisions quickly and work at high speeds, easily switching to new tasks, technologies, and areas of knowledge. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":106162,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f90d15cf-b2b3-4b15-ac62-a826b8149379/Picture11.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f90d15cf-b2b3-4b15-ac62-a826b8149379/Picture11.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture11.png\",\"name\":\"Picture11.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f90d15cf-b2b3-4b15-ac62-a826b8149379\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":291,\"height\":322},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Think globally, act locally: what does a network mean? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Behind the bird, you can see the symbol of the borderless of thinking, opportunities & growth. Regardless of location and time zone, titles, and skills, we are one global network of Quality Engineering professionals, and we know how to act outside the points on the map. Aren't these the most valuable qualities of a testing engineer? \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
